relevant_findings.general: Awake and alert. No acute distress.
relevant_findings.heent: PERRL. Mild scleral icterus. Moist mucous membranes. No oral lesions.
relevant_findings.heart: Regular rate and rhythm. No murmur appreciated.
relevant_findings.abdomen: Bowel sounds positive. Soft, nondistended. Mild tenderness to palpation just left of epigastric, otherwise nontender. No masses or hepatosplenomegaly appreciated.
relevant_findings.neurological: Alert and oriented x3. Cranial nerves II-XII grossly intact. Strength in upper extremities and lower extremities 5/5. Resting tremor in upper extremities bilaterally (baseline per patient, due to TB treatment).
